mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fuleiid AS "fuleiid", a.biaoma AS "biaoma", a.mingzi AS "mingzi", a.jiancheng AS "jiancheng", a.adress AS "adress", a.moji AS "moji", a.jiandangshijian AS "jiandangshijian", a.chedanshijian AS "chedanshijian", a.huanjingleixing AS "huanjingleixing", a.bumenfuzeren AS "bumenfuzeren", a.zhandian AS "zhandian"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO useable_bumenbiao( id, fuleiid, biaoma, mingzi, jiancheng, adress, moji, jiandangshijian, chedanshijian, huanjingleixing, bumenfuzeren, zhandian ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{fuleiid}, #{biaoma}, #{mingzi}, #{jiancheng}, #{adress}, #{moji}, #{jiandangshijian}, #{chedanshijian}, #{huanjingleixing}, #{bumenfuzeren}, #{zhandian} )
mapper.update: UPDATE useable_bumenbiao SET fuleiid = #{fuleiid}, biaoma = #{biaoma}, mingzi = #{mingzi}, jiancheng = #{jiancheng}, adress = #{adress}, moji = #{moji}, jiandangshijian = #{jiandangshijian}, chedanshijian = #{chedanshijian}, huanjingleixing = #{huanjingleixing}, bumenfuzeren = #{bumenfuzeren}, zhandian = #{zhandian} WHERE id = #{id}
